BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.BiSignal.writeToBiSignal#
BlackBox.type:
writeToBiSignal#
  :: HasCallStack                   -- ARG[0]
  => BiSignalIn ds d n              -- ARG[1]
  -> Signal d (Maybe (BitVector n)) -- ARG[2]
  -> Signal d Bool                  -- ARG[3]
  -> Signal d (BitVector n)         -- ARG[4]
  -> BiSignalOut ds d n

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.BiSignal.readFromBiSignal#
BlackBox.type:
readFromBiSignal#
  :: ( HasCallStack    -- ARG[0]
     , KnownNat n)     -- ARG[1]
  => BiSignalIn ds d n -- ARG[2]
  -> Signal d (BitVector n)
